body:
Closing: The culprit wasn't something missing in spack but the Homebrew gcc always puts the Homebrew as 1st RPATH. -1

Adds -Lsource_path/src/.lib to ensure that during make check,
test tools are linked and run with this libgdbm.so.6, not another one.
title: gdbm: Ensure that make check uses this libgdbm.so.6
